conversion_verification.notes: True isometric cutaway transformation achieved with consistent wall heights and volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection, clean geometry, and consistent wall thickness throughout.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout; room adjacencies and wall proportions are nearly perfect matches to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is very accurate, including specific bathroom fixtures and kitchen appliances.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with no artifacts; lighting supports depth perception well.

detected_errors.description: Minor door swing representation differs slightly from 2D architectural symbol style.

summary: An exceptionally faithful and geometrically accurate 3D translation of the original floor plan layout and interior contents.
